name: フォレスト・イン・ザ・ダーク　暗き森に集う夢
summary: The elder of the clan dies and leaves mysterious instructions to determine his heir - to find memory card game and play it to the end till next full moon. There are only several days left till the next full moon and thus hero arrives to the forest mansion to try his luck.
info:
• 中文名: 黑暗中的森林 聚集在黑暗森林中的梦
  • 平台: Windows
  • 游戏类型: ADV
  • 开发: ぎぶみぃそふと
  • 游戏出版商: SPEED
  • 发行: SPEED
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 发行日期: 1998/06/26
